data.text: @TracyBethHoeg 550 cases is not enough to make any conclusions. December was not the height of omicron. You’re a fraud.
@TracyBethHoeg Great work. BC s late but not great!
@TracyBethHoeg Can I have a source for this Tracy? Thnks
@youinthebushes @julien_lafleur @d_a_keldsen @TracyBethHoeg Everyone admitted to hospital is screened though correct? We’re not talking about access for the general public.

@julien_lafleur @d_a_keldsen @TracyBethHoeg You are wrong. These are hospital admissions. All admittees are tested as BC states its standard for Covid testing is the same as for other diseases, when it can affect treatment decisions. “David” is trolling, which is why the opponents of UoN are now reduced to.

@julien_lafleur @d_a_keldsen @TracyBethHoeg I'm not David but... we're not testing people. At all. Like, you have to be in VERY specific groups or very, very old in order to even access a test. And that's just the information you can get- a lot of it is deliberately inaccessible.

@d_a_keldsen @TracyBethHoeg Hi David, can you say why is it suspect? Also what would convince you that it is generalizable?
Thanks!
